meanings.sent1: After dinner, she retasted the delicious dessert.
meanings.sent2: He retasted the soup to make sure it was seasoned well.
meanings.sent3: The chef retasted the sauce and realized he forgot to add salt.
meanings.sent4: As she retasted the tea, memories of her childhood flooded back.
meanings.sent5: The wine connoisseur retasted the vintage bottle, savoring every sip.

meanings.definition: To experience the taste of something again.
meanings.sent1: The child retasted the ice cream, enjoying every lick.
meanings.sent2: He retasted the exotic fruit to see if his taste buds had changed.
meanings.sent3: She retasted the spicy dish and felt the heat all over again.
meanings.sent4: The traveler retasted the local cuisine, feeling like a native.
meanings.sent5: After years, he retasted his favorite childhood treat and smiled with nostalgia.
